QuestData.Title: News from Spires of Arak
QuestData.Description:
Commander, scouts from Spires of Arak have brought back news to the garrison. There's word of a brewin' war between bird-men and the Shattered Hand orcs.
Rokhan's askin' for your presence when your work is done here, should ya be willin' sir.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Rokhan at your garrison in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome back, boss-mon.
I know you'll probably be wantin' to get things settled here first, but there's been some word of an uprisin' in Spires of Arak. There might be some allies to be made if we get involved.
Thought ya might want to know.
